item.title: 对冲基金流动 摩根士丹利称，关税冲击后亚洲对冲基金增加日本和印度的投资
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）表示，亚洲对冲基金在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）于本月初发布全面关税政策后迅速削减了对日本和印度股市的持仓，上周又蹑手蹑脚地重返市场。【原文：Asian hedge funds tiptoed back into the market last week, adding to their positions in Japan and India shares, after quickly cutting exposure when U.S. President Donald Trump unleashed sweeping tariffs at the start of the month, Morgan Stanley said.】

item.title: 关税加剧全球增长担忧，股市震荡，油价疲软
item.description: 周三，全球贸易紧张局势可能缓和，但经济前景恶化，受唐纳德-特朗普关税影响的企业发出低迷信号，抵消了人们对全球贸易紧张局势可能缓和的宽慰，股市难以找到方向，油价下滑。【原文：Shares struggled for direction on Wednesday and oil prices slid as relief over a potential easing of global trade tensions was offset by a worsening economic outlook and dour signals from corporates swept up by Donald Trump's tariffs.】

item.title: 美国关税打击出口订单，中国工厂活动放缓
item.description: 周三的一项私营部门调查显示，第二季度伊始，中国工厂活动放缓，新出口订单大幅减少，就业人数恢复下降。【原文：China's factory activity slowed at the start of the second quarter, with a sharp fall in new export orders and the resumption of employment declines, a private-sector survey showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚第一季度通胀率高于预期，但核心通胀率降至三年低点
item.description: 澳大利亚第一季度消费者物价涨幅略高于预期，但年度核心通胀率仍放缓至三年低点，这为下月再次降息提供了更多理由。【原文：Australian consumer prices rose slightly more than expected in the first quarter, but annual core inflation still slowed to a three-year low and added to the case for another cut in interest rates next month.】

item.title: 特朗普称，DOGE 的工作导致向司法部移交欺诈案件
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二表示，根据特朗普的盟友、亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）牵头成立的削减成本机构--政府效率部（Department of Government Efficiency）的调查结果，有人向司法部提交了欺诈案件。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Tuesday there were referrals for fraud made to the Justice Department based on the findings of the Department of Government Efficiency, the cost-cutting agency that Trump ally and billionaire Elon Musk spearheaded.】

item.title: 中国 4 月份工厂活动降速超过预期
item.description: 周三，一项官方工厂调查显示，中国 4 月份制造业活动萎缩，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的 "解放日 "一揽子关税措施断送了两个月的复苏之际，进一步刺激经济的呼声依然不绝于耳。【原文：China's manufacturing activity contracted in April, an official factory survey showed on Wednesday, keeping alive calls for further stimulus as Donald Trump's "Liberation Day" package of tariffs snapped two months of recovery.】

item.title: 中国制造业采购经理人指数显示 4 月制造业活动下降
item.description: 周三的一项官方调查显示，中国制造业活动在四月份出现萎缩，扭转了两个月来的复苏态势，并且由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收145%的关税，要求生产商停止前置出货，进一步刺激经济的呼声持续高涨。【原文：China's manufacturing activity contracted in April, an official survey showed on Wednesday, reversing two months of recovery and keeping alive calls for further stimulus as Donald Trump's 145% tariffs called time on producers front-loading shipments.】

item.title: 关税忧虑占据上风，美元持稳但脆弱
item.description: 美元周三持稳，但有望创下自2022年11月以来的最弱月度表现，原因是唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统领导下的美国贸易政策反复无常，导致美元走软，同时提振了欧元、日元和瑞士法郎。【原文：The U.S. dollar was steady on Wednesday but poised for its weakest monthly performance since November 2022 as erratic U.S. trade policies under President Donald Trump left the greenback vulnerable while boosting the euro, yen and Swiss franc.】

item.title: 日本工厂产出下滑，特朗普关税令制造商大受打击
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策对全球制造商和众多行业造成了冲击，日本 3 月份的工厂产出降幅超出预期，受其关键的汽车行业拖累。【原文：Japan's factory output fell more than expected in March, dragged down by its key motor vehicles industry, as U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff policies rattle manufacturers and a whole host of industries globally.】

item.title: 风暴和需求疲软打击赌场，星际娱乐公司第三季度出现亏损
item.description: 星空娱乐公司（Star Entertainment）周三表示，由于季节性疲软、赌场游客减少以及昆士兰州因三月暴风雨而关闭的地产，这家陷入困境的澳大利亚博彩运营商在第三季度出现了经营亏损。【原文：Star Entertainment said on Wednesday it swung to an operating loss in the third quarter, as seasonal weakness, dwindling casino visitors and Queensland property closures from March storms battered the troubled Australian gambling operator.】

item.title: 贸易战担忧抑制需求前景，油价下跌
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普反复无常的关税政策引发了人们对全球经济增长和燃料需求疲软的担忧，油价在周三的亚洲早盘交易中走低。【原文：Oil prices edged lower in early Asian trading on Wednesday as President Donald Trump's erratic tariff policies raised concerns about weakening global economic growth and fuel demand.】

item.title: 韩元疲软，韩国 LG 能源解决方案公司第一季度利润增长 138
item.description: 韩国电池公司 LG Energy Solution（LGES）周三公布第一季度利润增长 138%，主要得益于有利的汇率缓解了主要海外市场电动汽车（EV）销售增长放缓的影响。【原文：South Korean battery firm LG Energy Solution (LGES) on Wednesday posted a 138% rise in first-quarter profit, helped by favourable foreign exchange rates that cushioned slowing growth of electric vehicle (EV) sales in major overseas markets.】

item.title: 特朗普放宽美国汽车关税的举措有何意义？
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二批准进一步减免国内汽车制造商在不到一个月前启动的25%的汽车和汽车零部件关税，称这将有助于汽车行业将更多生产迁回美国。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday approved additional relief for domestic automakers from his 25% vehicle and auto parts tariffs set in motion less than a month ago, saying it would help the industry to move more production back to the U.S.】

item.title: 星巴克将加强门店人员配备，缓慢推出自动化服务
item.description: 星巴克首席执行官布赖恩-尼科尔（Brian Niccol）周二表示，星巴克将加大对员工的投资，减少对设备的投资，包括之前吹捧的自动化系统，这打破了门店运营更多依赖技术的行业大趋势。【原文：Starbucks will invest more in staffing and less on equipment, including an automation system that it previously touted, CEO Brian Niccol said on Tuesday, breaking with a wider industry trend to rely more on technology for store operations.】

item.title: 三星电子第一季度营业利润小幅增长
item.description: 三星电子周三公布第一季度营业利润小幅增长，原因是担心美国关税的客户急于购买智能手机和商品芯片，减轻了表现不佳的人工智能芯片业务的影响。【原文：Samsung Electronics reported on Wednesday a small rise in first-quarter operating profit as customers concerned about U.S. tariffs rushed to purchase smartphones and commodity chips, mitigating the impact of its underperforming artificial intelligence chip business.】

item.title: 丰田与 Waymo 同意探索自动驾驶技术领域的合作
item.description: 丰田汽车和 Alphabet 旗下的 Waymo 周三表示，双方已同意探索合作，加快自动驾驶技术的开发和部署。【原文：Toyota Motor and Alphabet's Waymo on Wednesday said they have agreed to explore a collaboration on speeding up the development and deployment of autonomous driving technology.】

item.title: 澳大利亚西太平洋银行对冲8,940万美元冲击半年利润
item.description: 澳大利亚西太平洋银行周三表示，由于套期保值，2025 年上半年的税后净利润将减少 1.4 亿澳元（8935 万美元）。【原文：Australia's Westpac Banking Corp said on Wednesday net profit after tax for the first half of 2025 would be reduced by A$140 million ($89.35 million) due to hedging.】

item.title: 据《纽约时报》报道，派拉蒙董事会将就特朗普的 "60 分钟 "诉讼达成和解
item.description: 据《纽约时报》周二援引三位了解内部讨论情况的人士的话报道，哥伦比亚广播公司（CBS News）的母公司派拉蒙公司（Paramount）董事会为与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）就其 "60 分钟"（60 Minutes）诉讼案达成潜在和解提出了可接受的财务条款。【原文：The board of Paramount , the parent company of CBS News, outlined acceptable financial terms for a potential settlement with U.S. President Donald Trump on his "60 Minutes" lawsuit, The New York Times reported on Tuesday, citing three people with knowledge of the internal discussions.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司第一季度油气产量略有下降
item.description: 巴西国营石油公司（Petrobras）周二公布，第一季度石油、天然气和液化气日产量为 277 万桶油当量（boed），同比下降 0.2%。【原文：Brazilian state-run oil firm Petrobras reported on Tuesday oil, gas and gas liquids production of 2.77 million barrels of oil equivalent per day (boed) in the first quarter, down 0.2% from a year earlier.】

item.title: 对关税和经济的担忧加剧，英国企业士气下降
item.description: 周三，两项行业调查显示，英国商业景气降至三个月来的最低水平，雇主们担心美国关税和更广泛经济的影响，因为他们要努力应对更高的就业成本。【原文：British business sentiment fell to its lowest level in three months and employers were concerned about implications of U.S. tariffs and the wider economy as they grapple with higher employment costs, two industry surveys showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: Grab Holdings 季度收入超出预期
item.description: 本周二，Grab Holdings 第一季度营收超出华尔街预期，原因是尽管竞争激烈，该公司仍受益于其打车和食品配送平台的强劲支出。【原文：Grab Holdings beat Wall Street expectations for first-quarter revenue on Tuesday, as the company benefited from strong spending on its ride-hailing and food delivery platform despite strong competition.】

item.title: Codelco 董事长称 4 月份铜产量增加，美国和中国需求强劲
item.description: 智利国营 Codelco 公司董事长马克西莫-帕切科（Maximo Pacheco）周二表示，4 月份该公司的铜产量比上年同期增长了 22%，预计产量为 105,000 公吨。【原文：Copper output from Chile's state-run Codelco rose 22% in April compared to the same period a year before, with an expected output of 105,000 metric tons, Chairman Maximo Pacheco said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚超市运营商 Coles 第三季度收入增长 3.4
item.description: 澳大利亚 Coles 集团周三公布第三季度收入增长 3.4%，主要得益于其超市部门的强劲表现，因为注重价格的消费者利用超值活动和促销活动来购买更便宜的商品。【原文：Australia's Coles Group reported a 3.4% rise in third-quarter revenue on Wednesday, driven by strong performance at its supermarkets division as price-conscious consumers took stock of value campaigns and promotions to shop cheaper.】

item.title: 23andMe 破产后将由法院指定基因数据监督员
item.description: 基因检测公司 23andMe 周二同意让法院指定的监督员负责确保客户的基因数据在公司破产期间仍然受到保护，从而解决了与美国几个州的争议。【原文：Genetic testing company 23andMe agreed on Tuesday to allow a court-appointed overseer to take charge of ensuring customers' genetic data remains protected during the company's bankruptcy, settling a dispute with several U.S. states.】

item.title: 墨西哥龙舌兰酒制造商库尔沃（Cuervo）因比索贬值而获得更多利润，尽管销量下滑
item.description: 世界上最大的龙舌兰酒生产商贝克公司周二公布的第一季度利润比去年同期增长了 15%。【原文：Becle , the world's largest tequila producer, on Tuesday reported a first-quarter profit up 15% from a year earlier, pulling in more pesos due to the currency's weakening despite moving less product in the period.】

item.title: Meta 推出 Llama 应用程序接口，吸引人工智能开发人员
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司周二发布了一个应用程序接口，旨在吸引企业利用其 Llama 人工智能模型更轻松地构建人工智能产品。【原文：Meta Platforms on Tuesday announced an application programming interface in a bid to woo businesses to more easily build AI products using its Llama artificial-intelligence models.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，电子艺界裁员数百人，取消《泰坦陨落》游戏
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周二报道，电子艺界（Electronic Arts）将裁员数百人，并将取消旗下 Respawn Entertainment 部门正在开发的《泰坦陨落》（Titanfall）游戏。【原文：Electronic Arts is laying off hundreds of workers and is canceling a Titanfall game that was in development at its Respawn Entertainment unit, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 墨西哥电信巨头 America Movil 第一季度利润大增 39
item.description: 墨西哥电信巨头 America Movil 周二公布，其第一季度净利润与 2024 年同期相比大增 39%，原因是营业利润增加和融资成本下降。【原文：Mexican telecommunications giant America Movil on Tuesday reported a 39% jump in its first-quarter net profit compared to the same period in 2024, citing an increase in operating profit and a decrease in financing costs.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称捷蓝航空正与美国联合航空公司商谈合作事宜
item.description: 三位熟悉此事的业内人士告诉路透社记者，捷蓝航空公司和美国联合航空公司一直在就合作事宜进行谈判。【原文：JetBlue Airways and United Airlines have been negotiating a partnership, three industry sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Blackstone 探讨以 30 亿美元出售可持续性软件公司 Sphera
item.description: 据三位熟悉此事的人士透露，Blackstone 正在探讨以 30 亿美元出售可持续性软件和咨询服务提供商 Sphera。【原文：Blackstone is exploring a $3 billion sale of Sphera, a sustainability software and consulting services provider, according to three people familiar with the matter.】
